channel.title: List of bugs I have run into in the new 1.1.1 update
channel.description:
[details="Bug 1: Faulty Paladin"] #### What happened? Paladin unable to use Test Faith until d4
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Paladin unable to use Smite until d4
#### Steps to reproduce: Attempt to use TF as Paladin. [/details]
[_Bug 2: Faulty Mercenary Guard_] - Not a bug: Intended change in game appearantly
[details="Bug 3: Weird Mystic Chat"] #### What happened? Unable to use Mystic chat like it's supposed to be used
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Mystic chat is supposed to work like before
#### Steps to reproduce: Be linked / Link someone
#### Comments: I never actually encountered this bug personally, but a lot of people have had it and they speak weirdly about it: "Using normal chat speaks in mystic", etc. [/details]
[details="Bug 4: Mercenary / Missing Neutral Killer"] #### What happened? The Neutral Killer was a Mercenary / There were no Neutral Killers
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? The Neutral Killer should have been a KILLER / Existing.
#### Steps to reproduce: Begin a Game.
#### Comments: https://imgur.com/a/CZHhn [/details]
[details="Bug 5: Weird Text Colours + Text Outline Colours --+-- Bug 6: You Earned %GP% gp"] https://imgur.com/a/CZHhn [/details]
[details="Bug 7: Whispers are "doubled""] #### What happened? Whispers are repeated after eachother Example: From King [1]: Hey, this is a single message Hey, this is a single message
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? Whispers are only posted once. Example: From King [1]: Hey, this is a single message
#### Steps to reproduce: Whisper someone / be whispered to. [/details]
